channel.title: Adding custom stats to custom items
channel.description: well im thinking off adding statius and stuff but i need toov know how too add stats i tried once and nobody could logg in. anyone help?

item.title: Adding custom stats to custom items
item.dc:creator: @funkytown funkytown
item.description:
@funkytown wrote:

thanks,
but do i use tabs for every space?
thanks for your help.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding custom stats to custom items

item.title: Adding custom stats to custom items
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

This doesn’t belong in Client Help because of the fact is he asking something server-sided. You can add the bonuses via item.cfg. You are most likely getting an error because you are using spaces instead of tabs inside the cfg file.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding custom stats to custom items

item.title: Adding custom stats to custom items
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

[quote=“Owner Nader, post:3, topic:289944”][quote author=dillingo link=topic=383272.msg2877717#msg2877717 date=1248141683]

well im thinking off adding statius and stuff but i need toov know how too add stats
i tried once and nobody could logg in.
anyone help?

This should go in client help. You can make stats for the item in item.cfg though.
[/quote]he tried and none could login[/quote]
Well he either added it wrong in item.cfg or added it wrong in class8.java.

Read full topic
